title: Augustine Mulenga
text:
Augustine Kabaso Mulenga (born 17 January 1990) is a <a href="Zambia">Zambia</a>n <a href="association%20football">football</a> player. He plays for <a href="AmaZulu%20FC">AmaZulu FC</a> and <a href="Zambia%20national%20football%20team">Zambia</a>.
Club career.
In January 2018, Mulenga joined <a href="South%20African%20Premier%20Division">South African Premier Division</a> club <a href="Orlando%20Pirates">Orlando Pirates</a>. He made his Premier Division debut on 3 March 2018, coming on as an 84th minute sub for <a href="Justin%20Shonga">Justin Shonga</a> in a 3-1 home victory over <a href="Kaizer%20Chiefs%20F.C.">Kaizer Chiefs</a>. Mulenga scored his first competitive goal for the club on 4 April 2018 in a 2-1 league victory over <a href="Bloemfontein%20Celtic%20F.C.">Bloemfontein Celtic</a>. His goal, assisted by <a href="Thembinkosi%20Lorch">Thembinkosi Lorch</a>, was scored in the 77th minute.
International.
He made his <a href="Zambia%20national%20football%20team">Zambia national football team</a> debut on 26 March 2017 in a friendly game against <a href="Zimbabwe%20national%20football%20team">Zimbabwe</a>.
